pr_title: [F] Add back user id that was accidentally removed

timeline.author: Ceiu

timeline.message: Add back user id that was accidentally removed

Add back user id that was accidentally removed

    - Also, use 'integer/int64' as type for field specified as 'long'
      since long is not a valid type in openapi.
